SELECT e.* , f.star FROM (SELECT c.* , d.heart FROM (SELECT distinct(a.sidx) as sidx , a.midx , a.name , a.addr , a.detailaddr , a.tag , a.photo , a.services , a.delyn , b.min , b.max , b.people , b.sbed , b.dbed , b.qbed , b.kbed FROM stay a JOIN (SELECT sidx , MIN(price) as min , MAX(price) as max , MAX(people) as people , IFNULL(MAX(sbed),0) as sbed , IFNULL(MAX(dbed),0) as dbed , IFNULL(MAX(qbed),0) as qbed , IFNULL(MAX(kbed),0) as kbed FROM room WHERE delyn = 'N'
AND tags like CONCAT('%',#{op},'%')
GROUP BY sidx) b ON a.sidx = b.sidx) c LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(hidx) as heart , bidx FROM heart WHERE type = 'stay' GROUP BY bidx) d ON c.sidx = d.bidx) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT avg(star) as star , bidx FROM comment WHERE type = 'stay' AND delyn = 'N' GROUP BY bidx) f ON e.sidx = f.bidx WHERE e.delyn = 'N'
AND (e.name like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR e.addr like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR e.detailaddr like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%'))
AND e.name like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND (e.addr like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR e.detailaddr like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%'))
AND e.people >= #{filter.people}
AND e.min <= #{filter.max} AND e.max >= #{filter.min}
AND e.sbed != 0
AND e.dbed != 0
AND e.qbed != 0
AND e.kbed != 0
ORDER BY e.max desc
ORDER BY e.min asc
ORDER BY f.star desc
ORDER BY e.heart desc
LIMIT #{page}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(a.sidx)) FROM stay a JOIN (SELECT sidx , MIN(price) as min , MAX(price) as max , MAX(people) as people , IFNULL(MAX(sbed),0) as sbed , IFNULL(MAX(dbed),0) as dbed , IFNULL(MAX(qbed),0) as qbed , IFNULL(MAX(kbed),0) as kbed FROM room WHERE delyn = 'N'
AND tags like CONCAT('%',#{op},'%')
GROUP BY sidx) b ON a.sidx = b.sidx WHERE a.delyn = 'N'
AND (a.name like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR a.addr like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR a.detailaddr like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%'))
AND a.name like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND (a.addr like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR a.detailaddr like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%'))
AND b.people >= #{filter.people}
AND b.min <= #{filter.max} AND b.max >= #{filter.min}
AND b.sbed != 0
AND b.dbed != 0
AND b.qbed != 0
AND b.kbed != 0

SELECT c.*, d.star, d.cnt FROM (SELECT a.sidx , a.midx , a.name , a.addr , a.detailaddr , a.contents , a.tag , a.photo , a.services , a.delyn , b.heart FROM stay a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(hidx) as heart , bidx FROM heart WHERE type = 'stay' GROUP BY bidx) b ON a.sidx = b.bidx) c LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT avg(star) as star , count(cbidx) as cnt , bidx FROM comment WHERE type = 'stay' AND delyn = 'N' GROUP BY bidx) d ON c.sidx = d.bidx WHERE c.sidx = #{sidx}

SELECT name , price , tags , people , square , photo , sbed , dbed , qbed , kbed FROM room WHERE sidx = #{sidx} AND delyn = 'N' GROUP BY name , price , tags , people , square , photo , sbed , dbed , qbed , kbed

SELECT c.ridx , COUNT(c.name) as cnt FROM (SELECT a.ridx , a.name , a.sidx FROM room a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT r.ridx , rr.reidx FROM room r JOIN res rr ON r.ridx = rr.ridx WHERE rr.date1 <= #{date2} AND rr.date2 >= #{date1}) b ON a.ridx = b.ridx WHERE b.reidx IS NULL) c LEFT OUTER JOIN stay d ON c.sidx = d.sidx WHERE d.sidx = #{sidx} AND c.name = #{name}

SELECT a.cbidx , a.content , a.star , a.midx , a.photo , b.nickname FROM comment a, usertable b WHERE a.midx = b.midx AND a.bidx = #{bidx} AND a.type = 'stay' AND a.delyn = 'N' ORDER BY wdate desc LIMIT #{page}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT COUNT(cbidx) FROM comment WHERE type = 'stay' AND bidx = #{bidx} AND delyn = 'N'
SELECT AVG(star) as star FROM comment WHERE bidx = #{bidx} AND type = 'stay' AND delyn = 'N'
SELECT cbidx , content , star , photo FROM comment WHERE cbidx = #{cbidx}

SELECT r.reidx , r.ridx , r.date1 , r.date2 , r.merchant , r.pay , r.wdate , r.delyn , a.sname , a.rname , a.price , a.photo , a.sidx FROM res r JOIN (SELECT ro.ridx , s.name as sname , ro.name as rname , ro.price , ro.photo , s.sidx FROM room ro JOIN stay s ON ro.sidx = s.sidx) a ON r.ridx = a.ridx WHERE midx = #{midx} ORDER BY wdate desc
